title: Crime Alert 11.30.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 11.30.18
description:
Utah teacher kills her ex-husband's new girlfriend in front of their children. Unheard of deal for billionaire Jeffrey Epstein on sex-trafficking minors charges. Former Virginia Tech student gets 40 years in prison for planning and covering up grisly murder of 13-year-old girl.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
